page.title: 10HEALTH IN SANDBACH
page.content: "THE HILL" STANDS ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF THE TOWN IN TWO ACRES OF PLEASANT LAWNS,ORCHARD AND GARDENS.THE PROPERTY WAS TAKEN OVER AS A{LEONARD CHESHIRE {HOME}IN 1961. OVER THE YEAR "THE HILL" HAS SEEN MANY STRUCTURAL ALTERATIONS INCLUDING THE ADDITION OF A 15 SINGLE-BEDDED ROOM EXTENSION,A FULLY AUTOMATED LIFT,FULLY EQUIPPED TREATMENT AND THERAPY ROOMS AND A CHAPEL PLUS 2 BUNGALOWS IN THE GROUNDS TO HOUSE{FAMILIES}OF WHICH ONE MEMBER IS PHISICALLY DISABLED. THE L.CHESHIRE FOUNDATION{EMPLOYS}53 WORKERS,AT "THE HILL" ALL WORKING DIFFERENT SHIFTS BUT ONLY FOURTEEN ARE FULL TIME EMPLOYEES, CONTRIBUTING BETWEEN 40-48 HOURS A WEEK.THERE ARE ALSO A NUMBER OF VOLUNTARY VISITORS.THE{RESIDENTS}IN THE HOME ARE INCURABLY SICK OR PERMANENTLY DISABLED.
